member.name: IAppxEncryptionFactory3.CreateEncryptedBundleWriter
member.summary: Creates a write-only bundle object to which encrypted Windows app packages can be added.
member.param: A writable stream for writing the resulting encrypted app bundle.
The version number of the bundle. If the bundle version is 0, a default version based on the current system time will be generated.
Settings for creating the package.

Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for decrypting the bundle. The base key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.
Files exempted from the bundle writer.
The bundle writer object created.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxEncryptionFactory3.CreateEncryptedPackageWriter
member.summary: Creates a new instance of an .
member.param: A writable stream for sending bytes produced by the app package.
A readable stream that defines the package for the AppxManifest.xml.
A stream that defines the content group map.
Settings for creating the package.

Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for encrypting the package. The base encryption key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.
Files exempted from the package writer.
The package writer object created.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxEncryptionFactory3.EncryptBundle
member.summary: Creates an encrypted Windows app bundle from an unencrypted one.
member.param: A readable stream from the app bundle to encrypt.
A writable stream for writing the resulting encrypted app bundle.
Settings for creating the bundle.

Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for encrypting the bundle. The base encryption key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.
Files exempted from the bundle writer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxEncryptionFactory3.EncryptPackage
member.summary: Creates an encrypted Windows app package from an unencrypted one.
member.param: A readable stream from the app bundle to encrypt.
A writable stream for writing the resulting encrypted app bundle.
Settings for creating the bundle.

Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for encrypting the bundle. The base encryption key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.
Files exempted from the package writer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxEncryptionFactory3
member.summary: Creates objects for encrypting, decrypting, reading, and writing Windows app packages and bundles.
